Moderna aplikacija za KFC Hrvatska! Najlakši put za naručivanje hrane iz KFC-a. Aplikacija pamti vaše prethodne narudžbe te ih u samo nekoliko klikova možete jednostavno ponoviti kada god želite. Budite prvi koji će saznati za posebne promocije putem kupona. Kupone za popuste preuzmite iz aplikacije i pokažite na omiljenoj KFC lokaciji. Napomena za postojeće korisinike: Pozivamo vas da ažurirate KFC aplikaciju na novu verziju kako bi nastavili uživati u savršeno pripremljenoj piletini. 
Hvala na povjerenju! 

--------------- Pogodnosti -------------- 
* BRZO - U dva koraka se registrirajte (ime, prezime i e-mail) ili naručite omiljeni obrok bez registracije i uživajte u našim proizvodima uz brzu dostavu 
* ČUVA - Nakon prve registracije, vaši kontakt podaci će biti spremljeni i slijedeći put će sve biti jednostavnije
* ŠTEDI - Donesi posebne kupone u neki od KFC-ova i ostvari popust 
* LAKO - Naručivanje vaših omiljenih KFC proizvoda u samo nekoliko koraka 
* PREGLEDNO - KFC meni je podijeljen po kategorijama 
* PAMTI - Aplikacija pamti vaše prethodne narudžbe 
* JEDNOSTAVNO - Klikom na +/- možete povećati broj istog proizvoda u vašoj narudžbi 

------------------------------------------------- 

Zašto naručiti hranu iz KFC-a? 
* PRIPREMA SE PRIJE DOSTAVE Svakog dana naši kuhari ručno pripremaju piletinu po originalnim KFC receptima – zato svaki obrok ima tako savršen ukus. 
* PROVJERENA KVALITETA Meso se dostavlja u restorane isključivo od provjerenih proizvođača. Naš cilj je gostima servirati samo najbolje prirodne proizvode. 
* UVIJEK SVJEŽE Sigurni smo da ne postoji dobra hrana bez svježih sastojaka. Zbog toga se sastojci isporučuju u restorane nekoliko puta tjedno. Donesi kupon iz aplikacije i možeš ostvariti popust u svim KFC-ovima u Hrvatskoj: 
* KFC Arena 
* KFC Avenue mall 
* KFC Zapruđe 
* KFC City Center one West
* KFC City Center one East
* KFC City Center one Split
* KFC Črnomerec
* KFC Zadar

--------------- Napomene --------------- 
Za rad aplikacije neophodna je internet veza (mobilna veza ili WiFi) kako bi aplikacija uvijek preuzimala ažuriran cjenik i slala narudžbe u restoran. Odaberite svoju omiljenu kombinaciju, priloge i dodatke, naručite preko KFC Hrvatska aplikacije i dostava stiže na željenu adresu. Dostava hrane je dostupna na području Zagreba i Splita svakim danom od 16 - 23h. Nakon zaprimanja narudžbe, osoblje KFC-a će vas kontaktirati kako bi provjerili unesene podatke i sadržaj narudžbe. 

------------------------------------------------- 
Ukoliko vam je potrebna pomoć ili imate neku sugestiju, pošaljite nam e-mail na: mobile@ellecta.com 
* Molimo vas da ne ostavljate negativne ocjene ukoliko imate primjedbu na sadržaj ponude. Podatke o korisnicima KFC Hrvatska neće davati trećim stranama na uvid.

Kada pojedine namirnice uvesti u prehranu svojeg djeteta?

Podneblje, tradicija i prehrambene navike obitelji, uz glavne smjernice krovnih institucija, odlučujući su faktori u odabiru prvih bebinih namirnica dohrane.
Prehrana dojenčeta je individualna i različita, stoga je i njegova dohrana prilagođena samo njemu zbog čega se odabir i redoslijed namirnica prepušta roditeljima. Ovom ulogom roditelji dobivaju odgovornost zbog čega trebaju znati da uvođenjem novih namirnica u dječju prehranu ne 'stavljaju' samo hranu u njihov trbuščić, već ih im usađuju životne stavove kako o hrani, tako i o prehrani!

Iz ovog razloga, osnovna načela dohrane trebaju se poštivati zbog čega se, kao pomoć roditeljima, formira kalendar dohrane.
Kalendar dohrane služi kao informacija roditeljima te ga se nije nužno pridržavati. Njegov zadatak je roditeljima dati informaciju o tome kada, ako to žele, mogu pojedinu namirnicu uvesti u prehranu svojeg djeteta. Kalendar dohrane je informativna podloga za kreiranje i definiranje djetetove dohrane.

How many times have you opened the fridge and thought to yourself -- what can I make ?

How many times have you thrown away an ingredient, because you couldn't figure out how to use it before it expired ?

SuperCook to the rescue!

Unlike other recipe apps,  SuperCook only shows you recipes that require the ingredients you already have.  

All the recipes you see on SuperCook  are recipes you can make right now.  No more inconvenient grocery runs for a missing ingredient, at a time when you should be home, with your family and friends

Why purchase new ingredients when you can focus on what you already have?

SuperCook’s Unique App Features:
 
--Customized Recipe Ideas--
We’ve consolidated over 11 million recipes from 18,000 recipe websites, in 20 languages to create the largest recipe collection ever.   This knowledge was fed into an AI system that learnt the intricacies of all ingredients and how they can be mixed together.

All you have to do is build your pantry on the app – and you’re ready to make delicious meals without ever leaving your house!

SuperCook will find you any recipe you need, whether it’s for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or even a midnight snack.  

--Easily Add Your Ingredients--
Save time and money with an intelligent pantry. SuperCook’s voice dictation mode allows you to quickly add ingredients to your in-app pantry by simply saying them out loud.

The app will automatically find you recipes to make with what’s in your fridge – so all those lost ingredients in the back of your cupboard now have a place on your table.  It’s that simple!

Drage mame i tate, dobrodošle u aplikaciju sa receptima za bebe, mališane, malu i veliku decu.
BebiNjamNjam je nastao kao pomoćna baza recepata jedne mame koja je rešila da tu bazu podeli sa drugim mamama u nadi da će im biti od pomoći. Pored aplikacije možete pratiti i istoimeni nalog na društvenoj mreži instagram.

Recepti su obeleženi uzrastom bebe prema sadržaju namirnica neophodnih za pripremu jela, a prema smernicama Svetske zdravstvene organizacije. Početak nemlečne dohrane se preporučuje od 6. meseca bebinog života.

Recepte možete lajkovati ili staviti u omiljene, a možete i ostaviti komentar i pitati šta vas zanima.

Takođe možete čitati 'blog' na razne teme o ishrani, namirnicama, savetima i drugim temama vezanim za bebe i mališane. U komentarima ili na mail mi možete javiti ako biste volele da neku temu posebno obradimo.

Molim vas da u komentarima ne bude ružnih reči, svađa ili vređanja, jer će takvi komentari biti obrisani. Slobodno se uključite u diskusiju (potkovanu činjenicama) i hajde da zajedno radimo na tome da naša deca rastu i jedu zdravu i (barem što se načina pripreme tiče) proverenu hranu. Priznaćete da je u današnje vreme gmo i industrijske hrane to veliki izazov!

Pravila korišćenja. BebiNjamNjam (u daljem tekstu autor) ima autorska prava na sve sadržaje (tekstualne, vizualne, baze podataka i programerski kod). Neovlašćeno korišćenje bilo kog dela aplikacije, bez dozvole autora, smatra se kršenjem autorskih prava autora i podložno je tužbi.

Linkovi

BebiNjamNjam se sastoji od autorskih sadržaja, sadržaja oglašivača i linkova na druge web stranice i aplikacije. Sve sadržaje koristite na sopstvenu odgovornost i BebiNjamNjam nije odgovoran ni za kakvu štetu nastalu korišćenjem ove aplikacije.

Zaštita privatnosti

Za korišćenje aplikacije BebiNjamNjam potrebno je da se ulogujete putem svog Google naloga. Podatke o korisnicima BebiNjamNjam neće davati trećim stranama na uvid.

Korišćenjem mobilne aplikacije BebiNjamNjam korisnik se slaže sa svim gore navedenim uslovima. BebiNjamNjam ima pravo da korisniku šalje notifikacije vezane za aplikaciju, ako se korisnik prethodno saglasio o tome u okviru aplikacije.

From your morning coffee to those well-deserved after-work drinks, if you’re always with a foam-topped drink in your hand, why not make it super special? What if we told you, you could add a picture of your pet, a funny quote, a holiday greeting, or even your own selfie, to your favorite latte, cocktail, or draft beer? Yup, that’s right, we said a picture. On your drink. It’s a thing! And it’ll make your day. :) 

Thanks to the Ripple Maker, you can add personalized images or messages onto any foam-topped drink, so you can treat yourself to something special, surprise a friend or a loved one, or just make all your Instagram followers jealous. ;)  

Excited? Ready to go? So are we! Here’s what you have to do… 

1. Make sure there’s a coffee shop or bar with a Ripple Maker nearby (you can find the nearest location through the Ripples app). 
2. Upload a personal image or choose an image from one of our constantly-updated, topically-relevant libraries. 
3. Work that magic - edit the image, pick your Ripple Maker location, and voilà… 
4. Show the barista or bartender your order code to get your creation! (And try not to jump for joy when your amazing personalized drink is served; we wouldn’t want you to spill it.) 

By the way, if you upload your own image, please make sure it’s yours and that everyone around you will be cool with it sitting atop your drink (meaning, please keep it clean and don’t break any trademark laws or any of the rules that are listed in our website’s terms and conditions.) 

And just because we like you and can’t wait to see what you print (use #drinkripples so we won’t miss it), here are a few more friendly tips: 

If you’re uploading your own photo, pick one with strong contrasts 
If you’re going with an image from our library, pick something that will make you smile, pick something relevant, or just got to our Surprise Me category for a special treat. (You’ll never know what you get there, because these images can’t be seen in any other category… When we say surprise, we mean it!)

Enjoy your drink!

There is a new way to take the BeanBoozled Challenge. This app lets users play the game (remotely and in person), capture photos, find retailers and order online. 

BeanBoozled is a game of risk with two different challenging ways to play. Are you brave enough? 

The original BeanBoozled:  Ten delicious Jelly Belly jelly bean flavors (like Juicy Pear or Pomegranate) have been paired up with ten lookalikes in weird and wild flavors (like Booger or Old Bandage). Will it be Buttered Popcorn or Rotten Egg? Peach or Barf? There’s only one way to find out! 

The BeanBoozled Fiery Five Challenge asks how hot can you handle? Five progressively hot jelly beans range from smoldering Sriracha to scorching Carolina Reaper. Can you handle the heat?

What is the BeanBoozled App?
• Take the game anywhere! Take turns spinning the BeanBoozled wheel in the app to see what flavor you’ll have to try next.
• The app comes with a video sharing function so you can challenge your friends – wherever they are – in real time. You don’t need to physically be together to play BeanBoozled! Just use the built-in “Challenge A Friend” feature to play with your friend remotely. The app will send an invitation to your friend to play, and once they accept, you’re sharing the same spinner and playing the game together.
• Take photos while you play in the “Challenge A Friend” mode, or 6-second GIFs of the crazy faces your friends make. Add photo frames and share them to your social media channels.
• When you run out of a flavor, simply tell the app and the spinner will continue play without landing on what you’re missing.
• Need more BeanBoozled jelly beans? Search for a store near you with our built-in Store Locator, or use the option to buy online.
• Not sure what the jelly bean flavors are? Consult the handy flavor menu in the app for a helpful guide.

A Few Tips…
• DO have a trash can handy at all times. Trust us – you’ll need it.
• If you're playing BeanBoozled Fiery Five, have some milk, ice cream, rice or honey handy to extinguish the burn.
• DO NOT let wimps or crybabies play this game. (OK- maybe let them play after all. It can be fun to watch!)
• DO Make up your own rules. This is BeanBoozled where anything goes! Your imagination is your only limit.

Playing with your food has never been this much fun!
